docs.snippet: MILWAUKEE, March 1 (UPI) -- Lew Alcindor and Oscar Robertson each scored 29 points tonight to lead the Milwaukee Bucks to a 127-103 National Basketball Association victory over the Philadelphia 76ers and their 16th straight....
docs.lead_paragraph: MILWAUKEE, March 1 (UPI) -- Lew Alcindor and Oscar Robertson each scored 29 points tonight to lead the Milwaukee Bucks to a 127-103 National Basketball Association victory over the Philadelphia 76ers and their 16th straight.

headline.main: BUCKS ROUT 76ERS FOR 16TH IN A ROW; 127-103 Victory Puts Them 2 Shy of Knicks' Record -- 29 for Alcindor

docs.snippet: As a competitor, Joe Yancy never set the universe on its ears with his 35-pound weight throw or his times for the quarter-mile and the half, but as a coach and a human being, he's proved to be strictly a world-class long-distance performer....
docs.lead_paragraph: As a competitor, Joe Yancy never set the universe on its ears with his 35-pound weight throw or his times for the quarter-mile and the half, but as a coach and a human being, he's proved to be strictly a world-class long-distance performer.
